channel.title: Development on Ryan Duffy - AI Infrastructure & Local LLM Journey
channel.description: Recent content in Development on Ryan Duffy - AI Infrastructure & Local LLM Journey

item.title: Building the Foundation: Vault Creation to MVP
item.description: From vault design to working code. September 14-15, 2025 - vault creation, LibreChat deployment, and the first FastAPI backend that could parse conversations and generate content ideas.

item.title: The AI Awakening: Breaking Free from Context Limits
item.description: From context window frustration to local control. September 18-19, 2025 - a weekend working with Claude Code to install 17 local models, discovering what it means to own your AI conversations while working a full-time job.
